p: Sriram et al., synthesized a series of nevirapine derivatives with a broad-spectrum of chemotherapeutic properties for the effective treatment of HIV/AIDS [ 34]. Compound 9, containing an unsaturated β-amino acid moiety, showed 100% inhibition against Mycobacterium tuberculosis and also presented strong antibacterial activity against 24 pathogenic bacteria with MIC less than 1 µg/mL. The antiviral test was carried out using Vero cells, HSV-1, and aphidicolin (0.005 µg/mL) as a positive control.
